MemeDef.label: xenophilia
MemeDef.description: Relations with aliens are to be encouraged and embraced, to be fearful or hostile towards them only proves one's simplemindedness.

memeAdjective->open minded
memeAdjective->accepting
memeAdjective->alien loving

creation(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->[deity0_name] created a multitude of races, all a different manifestation of [deity0_possessive] perfect image.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->Our biogists catalogued and archived the multitude of [deity0_name]'s creations, which pleased [deity0_objective].
intro(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name], a veritable display of open-mindedness.

conflict(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->A xenophobic [foeLeader] despised the acceptance of the [memberNamePlural] community, and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] destroyed their halls with [place_personalWeapon]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] asked for help from members of other races to warn the [memberNamePlural] of the approach of the [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->[founderName] spread a message of acceptance and love as divinely ordered by [deity0_name], and used it to unite all the races of the [memberNamePlural] so they could defeat the [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->[founderName] was a social scientist in the early days of planetary colonization. Seeing the rabidly isolationist policies of many governments, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great scientists and sociologists to create a new civilization where all species could live in harmony.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->The oldest sociologist in my university taught me the history of life in the Universe, hinting that
lesson(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->we are not alone. Intelligence is not scarce among the stars, and we are all brothers and sisters
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->Only by working all together, side by side and leaving alone our differences, may we suceed at any given task.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->What could be more accepting of our intrinsic differences than a unifying, post-singularity archotech?
archistFact(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->In transcendence, our biological origins blur together.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->[inTheEnd], all of us will achive our ascendancy by working together.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->There is no concept of "race" amongst spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Xenophilia) ->The spirits will reveal their nature to us when we can fully accept one another as just varied manifestations of the same pure ideal.

MemeDef.label: xenophobia
MemeDef.description: Suffer not the alien to live, their mere existence is a threat to ours. Species of such are better as our servants or our sustenance.

memeConcept->prejudice
creation(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->[deity0_name] created us, a perfect manifestation of [deity0_possessive] divine image.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->The rest of [deity0_name]'s creations were just made as tools for us, it is [deity0_objective] will that we treat them as such.
intro(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name], putting us at the pinnacle of creation.
conflict(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->Jealous of our divine stature, an alien [foeLeader] tried to conquer the [memberNamePlural] community, and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] enslaved our people.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] arose among the slaves, organizing the [memberNamePlural] to fight against the alien opressor.
victory(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->[founderName] slaughtered the alien scum as divinely ordered by [deity0_name], and ushered the [memberNamePlural] into a new era of progress and superiority.

setup(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->[founderName] was a social scientist in the early days of planetary colonization. Seeing the foolishly accepting policies of many governments, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great scientists and sociologists to create a new civilization where the needs of our race take preference over the needs of disgusting aliens.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->The oldest hunter in our squadron taught me the history of life in the Universe, hinting that
lesson(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->we are not alone. Intelligence is not scarce among the stars and their mere existence is a threat to ours
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->There is no other way around it, the alien menace must be purged.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->Archotechnology is the pinnacle of biological evolution, and it should only be reached by those who are truly deserving.
archistFact(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->Can you imagine the threat a runaway alien post-singularity intelligence would pose to ourselves?
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->There is no other way around it, aliens must be purged before they are allowed to reach that point.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->Aliens are soulless creatures, abominations to the world of spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Xenophobia) ->Only by getting rid of all aliens will the spirits look favourably upon us.
